wikipedia_page.main: Robert John Moreland (born 21 August 1941) is a British management consultant and Conservative Party politician. After a single term as a  Member of the European Parliament (MEP), he served on the Economic and Social Committee of the European Union for twelve years and was elected to two local authorities. He is descended from George Cockle.

link_mentions.page: List of members of the European Parliament for the United Kingdom (1979–1984)

response: * Robert Moreland (born 1941), consultant, politician and a former Conservative Party Member of the European Parliament
